scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n emu,srv -c blue,green "firebase emulators:start --only firestore,storage" "sleep 3 && GCLOUD_PROJECT=thingspool FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8080 FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9199 MODE=dev PORT=3000 pm2 start ./dev/scripts/devRunner.js --no-daemon --watch --ignore-watch='dist public .git'"
scripts.devcss: SKIP_CLIENT_COMPILE=true SKIP_SERVER_COMPILE=true SKIP_SSG=true npm run dev
scripts.devserver: SKIP_CSS_COMPILE=true SKIP_CLIENT_COMPILE=true SKIP_SSG=true npm run dev
scripts.stop: pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all
scripts.beforeCommit: npm run build && MODE=ssg node dist/server/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run compileCSS && webpack --config dev/config/webpack.config.server.js && webpack --config dev/config/webpack.config.client.js
scripts.debugFirestore: gcloud auth application-default login && GRPC_VERBOSITY=DEBUG GRPC_TRACE=all node dev/scripts/debug-firestore.js
